name: Where is my package!?
description:
Main goal: Deliver goods around the city using drone. 

Packages are randomly spawned around the city.

Controls:

WASD - Move drone to the right, left, front, back
Space - Climb up
Z - Climb down
Shift - Boost speed
Right mouse click - Pull Out/In Rope to be able to attach package
Left mouse click - Deattach package

Share your score with others in comments section!
